1584660.name: Aquarist - My First Job
1584660.description:
Do you remember those carefree days as a child? Playing trics, having fun with your friends and having your first job to buy a console?
Aquarist My Fist Job will take you there! In this short introduction you will learn how to set up an aquarium, decorate it and take care of the fish.

Main Features:
- Two different levels and full tasks to perform
- Range of decoration, fish and accessories to buy
- Sneak peek of the full game Aquarist
1584660.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 保加利亚语, 繁体中文, 简体中文, 捷克语, 丹麦语, 芬兰语, 希腊语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 荷兰语, 日语, 韩语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 罗马尼亚语, 瑞典语, 泰语, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 越南语, 匈牙利语
